name: Penguin Stories
description:
Get to the end before the timer runs out. The penguins depend on you to collect the wood and deliver it to them. Keep the fire running. 

There are three levels in the game. You have 5 minutes to complete the game. 

Known issues and bugs: Timer does not reset once it runs out. For this, quit the app and start again to retry. Hope you enjoy the game. Don't forget to rate it and leave feedback. Thank you

Team: 

Level design in Unity by Ole Wolzak

Artwork by Georgia Pisarkiewicz

Sound design and Music implemented using Wwise-Unity Integration by Chirag Machhar
